description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Patch 10! FortressCraft has over 800k sales; see what makes this the best! Share your creative flare; earn votes and level up your server; hunt down relics, including rayguns and jetpacks. Physics objects, lasers and factories will impress your friends.  Browse the thousands of worlds available, or riddle your world with zombies and gun turrets. FortressCraft. The world is yours.
